ing: 4 English cucumbers - peeled, quartered and chopped
1 cup creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle Whip)
des: "This is a refreshing salad with cucumbers, onion, celery and corkscrew or wagon wheel pasta. Use the dressing as a dip, too!"
ins:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
In large bowl, combine pasta, cucumber, celery and onion.  In small bowl, combine dressing, buttermilk and celery seed.  Toss salad with dressing and serve.
